00024 #ifndef _ISOTOPEENVELOPEESTIMATOR_HPP_
00025 #define _ISOTOPEENVELOPEESTIMATOR_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "utility/misc/Export.hpp"
00029 #include "Chemistry.hpp"
00030 #include "IsotopeCalculator.hpp"
00031  
00032 
00033 namespace pwiz {
00034 namespace proteome {
00035 
00036 
00037 /// Class used for calculating a theoretical isotope envelope for a given mass,
00038 /// based on an estimate of the elemental composition for that mass.  For peptides,
00039 /// the elemental composition estimate is based on the average elemental composition
00040 /// of amino acid residues.  Mass distributions are calculated on construction of the 
00041 /// object and cached for quick access.
00042 class PWIZ_API_DECL IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator
00043 {
00044     public:
00045 
00046     struct PWIZ_API_DECL Config
00047     {
00048         enum Type {Peptide}; 
00049 
00050         Type type;
00051         unsigned int cacheSize; 
00052         double cacheMaxMass;
00053         int normalization;
00054         const IsotopeCalculator* isotopeCalculator; // must be valid during construction only
00055 
00056         Config()
00057         :   type(Peptide), 
00058             cacheSize(10000),
00059             cacheMaxMass(100000), 
00060             normalization(IsotopeCalculator::NormalizeMass |      // monoisotopic == 0
00061                           IsotopeCalculator::NormalizeAbundance), // norm_2 == 1 
00062             isotopeCalculator(0)
00063         {}
00064     };
00065 
00066     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator(const Config& config);
00067     ~IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator();
00068 
00069     Chemistry::MassDistribution isotopeEnvelope(double mass) const;
00070 
00071     private:
00072 
00073     class Impl;
00074     std::auto_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00075 
00076     // no copying
00077     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator(const IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator&);
00078     IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator& operator=(const IsotopeEnvelopeEstimator&);
00079 };
00080 
00081 
00082 } // namespace proteome
00083 } // namespace pwiz
00084 
00085 
00086 #endif // _ISOTOPEENVELOPEESTIMATOR_HPP_
